As much as I like to reinvent myself in order to grow, there are some core values I want to respect and observe. Here's a few:

  • Be positive. A positive mind always tries to find the beauty and the good in anything and anyone.
  • Be proactive. If there is a problem you can solve, then solve it! Don't wait somebody else to do it for you.
  • Knowledge means freedom. Never stop learning.
  • Flexibility is the most valuable asset nowadays.
  • Quality, not quantity.
  • Waste of resources is a mindset (and a cancer for this planet).
  • Respect is a mindset (and the solution to many many problems).
  • Everything around you is the final result of somebody else work. Respect it!
  • Do not work hard. Work smart! Time is finite. Don't waste it in worthless activities.
  • Multitasking yields poor productivity. Do one thing at the time and give it everything you got.
  • Do not judge and label anything or anyone (even if sometimes it's hard). Be open minded.
  • Think for yourself and do not believe in anything anybody says.
  • When you have a doubt, look up the original source for the answer.
  • Always choose the solution with the higher impact on your life/business/relation.
  • Honesty is the foundation of any relationship.
  • Trust requires time and effort to be built. Never screw it up!
  • Fake, negative, toxic people are just dead wood and need to be cut out from your life. You deserve more.
  • When somebody is talking, stay quiet and listen to them.
  • Any incomprehension can be solved talking.
